title: Brock Davies And Scheana Shay Reveal Vanderpump Rules Spoilers!!!
description:
Scheana Shay and Brock Davies of Vanderpump Rules fame Tap in! They talk about how they met, Insane stories that never made the show, dealing with drama on and off camera, starting a family, and so much more!
